comment: I took wellness online and it was super easy. You dont have to do much work and can get an easy A. There are 6 modules and no final. Each module had quizzes which you could look through the notes for answers. Even though I did not get super good quiz grades, I still got an A. He offers extra credit opportunities as well. 100%recommend!!!

This has been the worst experience for me. Professor Turchan does not give good feedback at all. took him 3 days to answer an email about an assignment that was locked by bearface and when he finally answered I tried to complete the assignment he put it in as a 0 even though the email was sent before the due date. easy assignments but beware
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: I really like Turchan,but I hated wellness using Bear face online platform. I guess it's unfair to weigh that into part of his rating, but if you take the HYBRID, it's annoying. I don't recommend taking Wellness online. The final and midterm were nit picky questions that aren't really relevant to wellness to begin with. He's cool but wellness sucks

Seriously the best. Easy class, for the attendance policy can only miss 2 days, gives extra credit towards the end of class and sends out reminders by email before assignments are due. Does not accept late work! One of the nicest professors I have taken so far and really cares about what he's teaching.

Hes not really open to helping you. What he writes in the syllabus is what happens. If it says due at 12:00 and you turn it in at 12:01, no discussion it is a zero. A dumb class to take online, take in person if you can.

Coach Turchan is an awesome down to earth guy who's willing to help and put in efforts to actual put some value in all the textbook stuff the online textbook is trying to cram into you. Really cool guy who's easy to strike a conversation with and is really friendly. Willing to help outside of class too.

Coach Turchan was awesome, hes understanding and personable. I honest want to hang out with him outside of class hes so cool. Class is easy and he gives a ton of extra credit. Class is not mandatory but go out of respect and he doesnt waste your time and make activities fun. I wish I could take him for all my health classes.
